diff_hunk:
@@ -1,47 +1,95 @@
-# ---[ GPU files
-# ------[ cuDNN
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *_cudnn.cc)
-set(Caffe2_GPU_SRCS ${Caffe2_GPU_SRCS} ${tmp})
-# ------[ general GPU
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *_gpu.cc)
-set(Caffe2_GPU_SRCS ${Caffe2_GPU_SRCS} ${tmp})
-# ------[ CUDA sources
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *.cu)
-set(Caffe2_GPU_SRCS ${Caffe2_GPU_SRCS} ${tmp})
-# exclude test files
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *_test.cc)
-exclude(Caffe2_GPU_SRCS "${Caffe2_GPU_SRCS}" ${tmp})
-
-# ---[ CPU files.
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *.cc)
-set(Caffe2_CPU_SRCS ${Caffe2_CPU_SRCS} ${tmp})
-# exclude test files and gpu files
-file(GLOB_RECURSE tmp *_test.cc)
-exclude(Caffe2_CPU_SRCS "${Caffe2_CPU_SRCS}" ${tmp})
-exclude(Caffe2_CPU_SRCS "${Caffe2_CPU_SRCS}" ${Caffe2_GPU_SRCS})
+project(c10_utils CXX C)
body: Can we not do this? What's the problem of simply aggregating source files? This adds difficult in dealing with CMake.
body_html: Can we not do this? What's the problem of simply aggregating source files? This adds difficult in dealing with CMake.
body_text: Can we not do this? What's the problem of simply aggregating source files? This adds difficult in dealing with CMake.
